name: Neon Heist
description:
Neon Heist is an unfinished experimental stealth game that combines the neon aesthetics with the stealth and escape room genres.

Make your way around the map stealthily, hacking cameras to to spot objectives and to escape the place after pulling off a successful heist. But be careful,  your hacking equipment is too powerful for a camera, making it a one time use basis. 

Credits: 
Janifer Lai (Programmer, UI, Project Manager)
Phoebe Watson (Level Designer, Miscellaneous)
Emily Lim (Environmental Assets)
Luke Bennett (Sound)
